title: About Us
paragraphs: At New Era Hockey, we promise more than just your average private coach â€“ we deliver an unparalleled experience where results and enjoyment go hand in hand. Our players are not only fulfilled but also brimming with motivation to persist in their hard work, all while enjoying the process while parents and players become like family.
We take immense pride in our ability to cultivate a hockey environment of learning, competitiveness, and a safe atmosphere that simultaneously creates good athletes, and better people.

experience.title: Coach Will's Experience
experience.description: Coach Will has trained and guided hockey players in the DMV for 6 years and has played hockey for 23. He is known for his commitment to the sport we all love.

additionalContext: This unique blend of elements allows players and parents alike to fully immerse themselves in the world of hockey training and development within the DMV area, ranging from prep-schools, all the way to the various clubs in the DMV, to complete beginners.
